cause.description:
This cause is an unofficial forum for the Harvard College Fund. The fund is a vehicle for giving back to a university to which many of us feel quite indebted. Among many other things, the fund allows you to target your support in areas which may be of particular interest including:
Undergraduate Life Fund Faculty Support Financial Aid/Scholarships Grad Fellowships Libraries Unrestricted Funds
A note on donating should you feel compelled:
You can donate Harvard directly through “causes” (but this cannot currently be targeted for your class participation)
Or, to make a donation online, you can follow this link (make sure to fill out the section including your class): https://post.harvard.edu/olc/pub/HAA/events/gifts_intro.html
